title: ISic001809. I.Sicily inscription 001809
body:
[---]
1ἔζησ-
2η ἔτη
3λ´

[---]
1ΕΖΗΣ
2ΗΕΤΗ
3Λ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text based upon transcription in museum inventory

English translation

[--] lived for 30 years

commentary

Although the fragment appears from the drawing in the inventory to be broken on all sides, space is visible before and after the lambda in line 3, and the text appears intact as it stands, missing only the earlier part naming the deceased. The fragment appears to be unpublished.
